S.FORM: Don Barksdale kawas tay 1923 , ryax sa tay 31 nqu tay 3, Don Barksdale, squliq na p'unro. (mhuqil sa kawas tay 1993) qnxan nya(qyanux nya) Barksdale htgan na ryax maki cyalipuniya awk'lang.Don Barksdale ga panga usuw qaya na squliq mtzyaw beh po'man.cyux maki lingay polihng pqwansan biru mqbaq biru. Barksdale ga mqbaq mari na p'unro maki koyeng. aring 1941 kawas tehok 1943 kawas cyux maki maling pqwasan biru mqwas ru myugi,tmasot mqwas ru myugi magal blaq balay na pqwasan biru pira. pincyuwagan nya' ryax qnxan nqu Don Barksdale sa senmung pgnawgan mari'. NBA 1951 kawas hiya ru Baltimore Bullets biru qutux wagiq biru. Nathaniel CliftonChuck Cooper ,Earl Lloyd( , ) ru Hank DeZonie,1950 kawas tmwang lanmo lga,te qutux mzyu mari maki NBA na Amerika squilq.suruw lga,Barksdale musa Boston Celtics,sazing kawas,hiya Kakao pincyogan nya mhngaw la. Later years masoq qnxan na mzyu mari lga,musa mise na renki cyux maki kosi nya ru gyahan sazing lahuy na mhngan maki Oakland. Olympic Games kingpay na tkura' mari' na mmlikuy sa kawas tay (1948) na Olympic Games. 28 kawas tmwang NBA. mhuqil 1993 kawas 3 byacing 8 ryax,magal nbu wal mhuqil la maki Oakland,California69 kawas nya. pincyuwagan nya' pspngan mari sa may yugal yacing masuq mspung mari sa pspngan mari na maycyugal byacing lga
